TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Pasongan, title = Pasongan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pasongan} }

S.FORM: == Pangangan 八桑安名稱由來 == Tahapinangan 特色 Tamdaw 人口 Itiniay i Changbin Cen no Taitung ko Pasongan a niyaro', 113 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 259 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 237 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 22 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 88%, Bunun 0.5%, Tayal 0.5%, roma 2%. Pitooran 信仰 O finacadan no Yincomi 所屬阿美族群

== Pangangan 八桑安名稱由來 == Tahapinangan 特色 Tamdaw 人口 Itiniay i Changbin Cen no Taitong ko Pasongan a niyaro', 113 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 259 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 237 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 22 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 88%, Bonon 0.5%, Tayal 0.5%, roma 2%. Pitooran 信仰 O finacadan no Yincomi 所屬阿美族群
